nschultz.watcher.core

Class ChangedFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nschultz.watcher.core.ChangedFile

  • public class ChangedFile
extends java.lang.Object
    The {@link ChangedFile} class represents a file that has been changed in a directory which is being watched by the {@link DirectoryWatcher} class.
    Note that since this class contains a package private constructor it can not be initialized from outside the library. This is because only the {@link DirectoryWatcher} should be able to create such an instance.
    Also note that the whenAsString methods will NOT return a result that could be considered hundred percent accurate. There very might well be some amount of delay between the occurrences of the change event and the result of the whenAsString methods.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Niklas Schultz
